fields.comment: enemy_drop, if set will modify the item_count_min, item_count_max...
fields.name: enemy_drop

fields.comment: e.g. 'bullet,bullet,damage' ... actions are parsed into a string
fields.name: actions

fields.comment: e.g. '10,10,-1' ... action uses remaining counts are parsed into a string
fields.name: action_uses_remaining

fields.comment: file names of other entities we should spawn from this chest, comma separated
fields.name: other_entities_to_spawn

fields.comment: this is used to figure out what we spawn from this chest
fields.name: mSeed
